title: List of supported living / residential services / care and nursing homes

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
I am writing to request information as part of the freedom of information act.
I would like to know the name of the supported living / residential services / care and nursing homes that operate within your borough or that you provide funding for, for vulnerable adults and what the current agency spend for each service is. Please can you provide a breakdown of the spend as well as the names of the services.
Yours faithfully,
Darren Sarpong

Dear Darren Sarpong,
Thank you for your request for information relating to list of supported
living / residential services / care and nursing homes which we received
on 11/01/2024.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 08/02/2024. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ

Dear Darren Sarpong,
Thank you for your request for information relating to list of supported
living / residential services / care and nursing homes which we received
on 11/01/2024.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
Before we can begin to process your FOI Request, we would like to clarify
what information you require.
1. Is the request asking just about the services Sheffield City Council
own and operate ourselves within the city or all independent providers
who we fund placements at?
2. Is the request solely asking for agency spend or asking for spend on
the provision of actual services?  If it is agency spend, then this
would not be held by Sheffield City Council where Sheffield City
Council does not operate the service directly for example.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to a
request within 20 working days. The 20 working day clock will start the
day after we receive the necessary clarification.
You can provide your clarification by replying to this email. Please
note, if clarification is not received within 2 months your Freedom of
Information request will be closed.
We look forward to hearing from you.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
